page.title: 11WHERE FATHERS WORK
page.content: We were doing a survey of where parents work and what they do.We surveyed all of the eleven year old children attending County Primary Schools in our area.Many fathers travel to work in Bristol, 14 fathers worked there.5 fathers work in Weston.One father works in Bath. Another 14 fathers work locally in Churchill,Langford,Wrington and Shipham.All fathers are employed.Some fathers work in other districts; Leicester,Portishead and Oxford.Eight children's fathers had to travel 50 miles per day at least 3 days a week.We found out that 9 people work at home.24 people work in an office, 7 fathers didn't work in either. Then we asked people what their dad's job was. Only 5 had the same job.13 fathers had company cars.
